Escavalier (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0588: Karrablast
Pokémon
#0590: Foongus →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Escavalier (TCG Pocket).

Escavalier has been featured on 10 different cards since it debuted in the Noble Victories expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Escavalier cards are normally Metal-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Escavalier

Escavalier
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Escavalier Noble Victories 80/101 Red Collection 053/066
Escavalier Dark Explorers 74/108 Dark Rush 052/069
Escavalier Plasma Blast 61/101 Megalo Cannon 052/076
Escavalier Phantom Forces 64/119 Phantom Gate 059/088
Escavalier Crimson Invasion 69/111 Awakened Heroes 036/050
Escavalier Unified Minds 142/236 GG End 031/054
Escavalier Darkness Ablaze 124/189 Explosive Walker 054/070
Escavalier Brilliant Stars 101/162 Start Deck 100   305/414
Escavalier Journey Together 102/159 Battle Partners 063/100
Escavalier Black Bolt 060/086 Black Bolt 065/086
Black Bolt 138/086 Black Bolt 146/086


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
